headline.main: Laval Alleged to Spurn Offer of Return to Cabinet -- Nazis See Collaboration Omen in Exchange of Consuls With Vichy

lead_paragraph: VICHY, France, Oct. 17 (U.P.) -- The committee charged with writing a new French Constitution will recommend that France remain a republic, it was revealed today amid political manoeuvring that was said to include an unsuccessful attempt to restore Pierre Laval to the Petain Cabinet.
